channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 21:30 A. Run in the Kharkiv region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 21:30 A. Run in the Kharkiv region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
